documentation:
CreatePrtgDeviceEntidad : Represents the entity for creating a PRTG device.
ProductDto : Data transfer object for PRTG device information.
UpdatePrtgDeviceEntidad : Represents the entity for updating a PRTG device.
DeletePrtgDeviceEntidad : Represents the entity for deleting a PRTG device.

code:
USE [catalogos]

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 23:45:23.758644
-- Description:	Obtener todos los dispositivos
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_GetAll]
    @fechaInicio DATETIME = NULL,
    @fechaFin DATETIME = NULL
AS
BEGIN
    SELECT [idOb], [device], [host], [tags]
    FROM [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    WHERE (@fechaInicio IS NULL OR fechaCreacion >= @fechaInicio)
      AND (@fechaFin IS NULL OR fechaCreacion <= @fechaFin)
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 23:45:23.758644
-- Description:	Obtener dispositivo por ID
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_GetById]
    @idOb INT
AS
BEGIN
    SELECT [idOb], [device], [host], [tags]
    FROM [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    WHERE [idOb] = @idOb
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 23:45:23.758644
-- Description:	Añadir un nuevo dispositivo
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_Add]
    @device VARCHAR(50),
    @host VARCHAR(50),
    @tags VARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO [dbo].[prtgDevices] ([device], [host], [tags])
    VALUES (@device, @host, @tags)
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 23:45:23.758644
-- Description:	Eliminar un dispositivo por ID
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_Delete]
    @idOb INT
AS
BEGIN
    DELETE FROM [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    WHERE [idOb] = @idOb
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-17 23:45:23.758644
-- Description:	Actualizar un dispositivo
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_Update]
    @idOb INT,
    @device VARCHAR(50),
    @host VARCHAR(50),
    @tags VARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN
    UPDATE [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    SET [device] = @device,
        [host] = @host,
        [tags] = @tags
    WHERE [idOb] = @idOb
END
documentation:
prtgDevices_GetAll: Obtener todos los dispositivos
prtgDevices_GetById: Obtener dispositivo por ID
prtgDevices_Add: Añadir un nuevo dispositivo
prtgDevices_Delete: Eliminar un dispositivo por ID
prtgDevices_Update: Actualizar un dispositivo

GetAll : Método para obtener todos los dispositivos PRTG
GetById : Método para obtener un dispositivo PRTG por ID
Add : Método para añadir un nuevo dispositivo PRTG
Delete : Método para eliminar un dispositivo PRTG por ID
Update : Método para actualizar un dispositivo PRTG
